mapper.select: select order_no , member_name supporter_name , p.project_title , reward_title , order_option , order_count , to_char(order_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order_date , order_status , shipping_status from tb_order o join member using (member_no) full join project p on (o.project_no = p.project_no) join reward using (reward_no) order by order_no desc

select o.order_no , o.order_date , sm.member_name supporter_name , to_char(p.project_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') project_end_dt , o.order_status , pm.member_name partner_name , p.project_title , r.reward_title , o.order_option , o.order_count , to_char(r.reward_price, '999,999,999,999') reward_price , to_char(o.order_plus, '999,999,999,999') order_price , to_char(o.total_price, '999,999,999,999,999,999') total_price , py.card_no , o.receiver_name , o.address_no , o.address_detail , o.address , o.receiver_phone , o.shipping_req , o.shipping_status , o.shipping_com , o.shipping_no from tb_order o join member sm on(o.member_no = sm.member_no) join project p on(o.project_no = p.project_no) join member pm on(p.member_no = pm.member_no) join reward r on (o.project_no = r.project_no) join pay py on(o.order_no = py.order_no) where o.order_no = #{orderNo} and o.reward_no = r.reward_no

select order_no , member_name supporter_name , p.project_title , reward_title , order_option , order_count , to_char(order_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order_date , order_status , shipping_status from tb_order o join member using (member_no) full join project p on (o.project_no = p.project_no) join reward using (reward_no)
where order_no like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or member_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where ${orderKeyword} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
order by order_no desc

select count(case when o.shipping_no is null then 1 end) as noneShipping , count(case when o.shipping_status = 1 then 1 end) as readyShipping , count(case when o.shipping_status = 2 then 1 end) as shipping , count(case when o.shipping_status = 3 then 1 end) as doneShipping , count(case when o.order_status = 2 then 1 end) as refund , count(case when o.order_status = 3 then 1 end) as dropRefund , count(case when o.order_status = 4 then 1 end) as comRefund , count(case when o.order_status = 5 then 1 end) as refRefund from tb_order o join project p on(p.project_no = o.project_no) join member m on(m.member_no = p.member_no) where m.member_no = p.member_no and p.project_no = 2

select o.order_no , m.member_name supporter_name , o.order_status , to_char(o.total_price,'999,999,999,999,999') total_price , r.reward_title , r.reward_content , o.order_option , o.order_count , o.shipping_status , o.shipping_com , o.shipping_no , to_char(delivery_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') delivery_date from tb_order o join member m on(o.member_no = m.member_no) join reward r on(o.project_no = r.project_no) join project p on (o.project_no = p.project_no) where p.project_no = 2 and o.reward_no = r.reward_no

select o.order_no , m.member_name supporter_name , o.order_option , o.order_count , to_char(o.total_price,'999,999,999,999,999') total_price , r.reward_title , to_char(r.reward_price,'999,999,999,999,999') reward_price , re.refund_no , re.r_reason , re.r_changename from tb_order o join member m on(o.member_no = m.member_no) join reward r on(r.project_no = o.project_no) join refund re on(o.order_no = re.order_no) where o.order_no = #{orderNo} and o.reward_no = r.reward_no

select o.order_no , m.member_name supporter_name , r.reward_title , o.order_option , o.order_count , to_char(o.total_price,'999,999,999,999,999') total_price , re.refund_no , re.r_reason , re.r_changename , to_char(r.reward_price,'999,999,999,999,999') reward_price , to_char(o.order_plus,'999,999,999,999,999') order_plus from tb_order o join member m on(o.member_no = m.member_no) join reward r on(o.reward_no = r.reward_no) join refund re on (o.order_no = re.order_no) where o.order_no = #{orderNo}

select o.order_no , m.member_name supporter_name , o.order_status , to_char(o.total_price,'999,999,999,999,999') total_price , r.reward_title , r.reward_content , o.order_option , o.order_count , o.shipping_status , o.shipping_com , o.shipping_no , to_char(delivery_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') delivery_date from tb_order o join member m on(o.member_no = m.member_no) join reward r on(o.project_no = r.project_no) join project p on (o.project_no = p.project_no)
where order_no like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or shipping_no like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or member_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where ${condition} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and and o.reward_no = r.reward_no order by order_no desc
